website_summaries.verdict: The best value. You won't find a better body pillow in this price range.
pros: A top choice among expectant mothers thanks to its generous full body support, including comfort for the hips and neck
cons: Not the smallest body pillow on the market, but its size is actually an advantage for most

customer_reviews.title: Tore while placing cover
customer_reviews.text: My pregnant wife loved it after using the pillow for 3 months. I removed the pillow cover and tried to put it on and it tore. Wasted 60 bucks. I would give it 5 stars if it wouldn't tore.
customer_reviews.author: ashok reddy

customer_reviews.title: Heaven Sent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 29weeks pregnant with my 7th child. My poor body has obviously taken quite a beating. First night with this pillow, I literally passed out as though the angels came from the heavens and rocked me to sleep. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flecia

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine but pharmedoc is the same for cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine. It’s my second pregnancy pillow and feels just the same as the PharMeDoc brand which is cheaper priced. The pharmedoc also felt longer and a bit softer/puffier. This is a fine pregnancy pillow but you can save some dollars and get the pharmedoc and won’t see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: She is now sleeping better than ever before
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow for my wife, because she is pregnant and was having issues sleeping. She is now sleeping better than ever before, and she plans on using it after the baby is born. This pillow has also humbled me greatly. The morning after her first use, when I said good bye and I love you at 5 am when I left for work, she responded with "I love Snoogle." That's all she said before falling deep into a snoogle coma. That was a tough morning for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom_E

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I got for my wife during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a world of difference. My wife's sleep quality improved immensly the first night she used this. Once she hit a certain point, she was miserable trying to sleep on her back/side. This pillow was her saving grace and made her last few months bareable. I'd highly recommend this to anyone in that situation. It provided great support and comfort, while also having decent ventilation. We also ordered a washable cover for it, which helped. Great product and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PCN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it so much
customer_reviews.text: I literally can not rave enough about this pillow. I'm not even pregnant and this is my favorite pillow. I bought it because I read it was great for eliminating back pain while sleeping and it really has. I like to sleep on my stomach which ends up giving me back problems because I have a large chest so I bought the pillow to try and train myself to not sleep on my stomach. It's shape hugs you and supports you any way you sleep on it. It is the perfect texture and the PERFECT firmness. The cover is incredible, super soft jersey knit.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie8192

customer_reviews.title: Pillow cover is impossible to replace after washing. The pillow ripped while trying to put the cover back on!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great until we needed to remove the cover for washing. It is impossible to get the cover back onto the pillow!!! In our attempt to do so the entire pillow ripped down the seam, which shows just how cheaply it is made. Very frustrated to say the least. I contacted Amazon for a replacement or refund and the only option I'm given is to ship the item back, which will be a huge hassle, even though the pillow is ruined and useless to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great but won't last another pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: The first two nights I had this thing I slept better than I ever had. Yes it does take up some edges of my body that my partner would have otherwise like to cuddle with, but when you're pregnant and hormonal may be blocking them out of your space isn't so bad 😆. The head area is very comfortable but the rest of it can be sort of confusing as to exactly how it's supposed to be positioned. Still, it has proven useful. The white cover does fade and yellow even after washing, and the fluffiness definitely becomes less fluffy over time. I think by the end of my pregnancy the durability will have been pretty tested.
customer_reviews.author: Shayen V. Demirel

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you are having difficulty sleeping or finding a comfortable position when hanging out
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! I was having issues sleeping on my left side because of pain under my breastbone, but the snoogle has helped significantly! I also used it on the couch to sit upright, and it's great! It definitely takes up a lot of space, so make sure you have a queen bed or bigger if you sleep with your partner. The only issue I have is getting out of bed at night to go to the bathroom. You get a little "caught" in it. Otherwise, it was a great purchase after a friend recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great husband replacement
customer_reviews.text: After being dumped in the middle of the apocalypse, I needed something to fill the void left by my deadbeat husband. This is great for feeling like you’re not sleeping in a bed alone. I’ve never been a side sleeper before but now I get better sleep than I ever did with a man snoring next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Hate it. It’s too firm, hurts my neck. Can’t get comfortable with it. I even had my sister come over to help show me how to properly use this thing and it didn’t help. Just my personal experience with it. Many of my friends and doctor recommended this pillow but it did not work for me. I need something less firm.
customer_reviews.author: Allie O

customer_reviews.title: Good, but some issues
customer_reviews.text: During the early stages of my second trimester (before I began to show, when they tell you to stop sleeping on your back, etc.), this was wonderful!! When I began to show, I needed more support under my belly, and I kept getting leg cramps/charlie horses because it's hard to extend your legs with these. I still use it because it supports my back well, but I use a body pillow to support my legs and belly.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hochmuth

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pregnancy, 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: On my second pregnancy and am buying this pillow again. I gave my last one to a cousin. It helped with my hip pain in my first pregnancy and it was so comfortable and made sleeping a breeze. I purchased another pregnancy pillow for half the price and am returning it and paying double to buy this one because the other one just doesn’t compare. The only reason I took off a star is because the pillow doesn’t extend on both sides and can be a pain when you’re trying to turn over in bed because of the bulkiness
customer_reviews.author: Janie Purvis

customer_reviews.title: too high, too thick, too hard, too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I had high hope on this pillow because I started to feel uncomfortable sleeping at 18 week pregnant. I was very excited when I made an order but ended up not able to use this pillow for longer than 10 mins. It's too high for my neck and my neck had to bend to fit it and my neck and arm felt sore. It's also very hard and heavy and rigid. Not ideal design at least for me. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Alleviated Back Pain, Tailbone Pain from Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I will sleep the same without this pillow! I broke down and bought this pillow after 6 months of pregnancy and not being able to keep a pillow between my knees to ease my back pain. This pillow is as massive as you’d think, but it makes all the difference between sleeping comfortably and moving around in bed trying to constantly find a spot that you can tolerate. This design eased the pressure on my lower back and tailbone, as well as keeping me in a position that is ergonomically correct for being in the latter stages of pregnancy. Definitely worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime_Ranay

customer_reviews.title: Love this design!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! I'm pregnant with number 5 and had a almost identical design before. I tried a diffrent style (all around pillow, U shape) but didn't find it comfortable. I had to return it. There wasn't enough space in the U. Pros: pillow goes into many different shapes. It has the U shape on the very ends making it convenient for your head or to put between your legs. it has a washable cover. The stuffing has also held its shape. Cons: i do find the cover to be a little rough, however, i think it makes it easier to spot clean. It is very large in the bed, but smaller than most pregnancy pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'm 16 weeks pregnant and found that I needed a pregnancy pillow bad. I suffered with lower back pain well before becoming pregnant but have found that it has worsened. This pillow helps with the aches and pains. Before this pillow, I found myself tossing and turning at night. I've gotten the best sleep with this pillow and no neck pain at all. It is large and I'm only 5'0 but I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: WLee

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recomend this enough!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about this pillow, so much so that I can completely overlook how big and bulky it is. This was an absolute lifesaver while I was pregnant; getting comfortable can be difficult! I slept like a baby (so to speak) using this. I loved it to much my sister in law ordered one because she was having back spasms and couldn’t sleep through the night, and she called me almost in tears after the first night using this pillow because she was actually able to sleep through the night! Sooooooo worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Haley M.

customer_reviews.title: Getting more uncomfortable as my pregnancy progresses.
customer_reviews.text: For a while in my middle to end of second trimester this pillow was amazing, I've been using it daily for about 8 weeks, but in the last few nights ive begun to experience hip pain and it is growing increasingly more difficult to switch from side to side while using this pillow. Although I am still currently using it I no longer put it between my legs to avoid this difficulty when switching positions (so I can avoid joint pain). So basically I use it as a head pillow only. I was hoping the pillow would have more belly support, but it is too bulky to put under my bump (I am 26 weeks).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Helped my neck after years of stomach sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I'm not now, nor have I ever been, pregnant. However I had a terrible habit of sleeping on my stomach and that was killer on my neck. I got this a few months ago and the desire to sleep on my stomach has all but disappeared and even my chiropractor has noticed my neck is a lot better than it used to be. A few cons: the case is hard to wash (I just slipped a normal pillow case over the top of mine and that works for me), after a few months the pillow has gotten a little flatter but not too much, it looks a little awkward under the covers of a made up bed. That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany H. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: When I received this pillow I initially loved it. I loved the way it hugged around my back to give me back support and the ability to contour it to my shape. I flip over many times during the night and flipping over with this pillow is a chore. It's very cumbersome to get just right. The more I used it the itchier the fabric felt. The fabric pilled up with washing and became itchier still. Toward the end of my pregnancy I was so itchy (especially when using this pillow) that I had a lot of trouble sleeping. My dog ended up getting more use out of the pillow than I did since it was too itchy for me.
customer_reviews.author: JennyHeigl

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable pillow I've experienced!
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad that I just had to throw away the best pillow I've ever experienced in my 45 years. Alas, it was closing in on 5 years (far surpassing its recommended lifespan). It still maintained its super comfy shape, but after buying it during my pregnancy and using it every day since, I'm sure it was filled to the brim with allergans, since that tends to happen with pillows :(. I highly recommend this pillow and I look forward to getting another one one day soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it so much, we got them for the other pregnant people in our lives.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife early in her pregnancy. She had told me how she was really wanting a pregnancy pillow to help her sleep. She was waking up every morning tired, uncomfortable, and achy. After doing more research than was required, I made up my mind and bought this for her. She loves it and has become the only pillow she sleeps with. We also have other people in our family who are pregnant, and have gotten this pillow as a gift, and they've told us how much they love it as well. The wife has declared this pillow a pregnancy must-have.
customer_reviews.author: JDubya

customer_reviews.title: finally a good nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: In first and most of second trimester I was really opposed to using a pregnancy pillow because it was still wayyyy more comfortable to sleep on my stomach. However, once being a stomach sleeper became impossible, I was miserable trying to sleep on my side with regular pillows. I had lots of neck, shoulder and back pain. I was desperate and I started using the snoggle! I was able to sleep 3-4 hours straight with no pain. This pillow has good support and has makes sleeping easier in 3rd trimester. It is pretty bulky and takes up quite a bit of room in a king bed, but it’s worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy- helped alleviate back and hip pain
customer_reviews.text: I've experienced lower back pain from the very first trimester. I found this pillow comfortable and supportive on my lower back. In the third trimester, I started to experience hip pain. I started sleeping with the lower portion of the "C" so that the pillow was between my ankles and knees and my hip pain went away! I'm 5'4" and was able to sleep this way comfortably. My least favorite part of this pillow is putting the cover back on after washing it! But good luck finding any pregnancy pillow that is easy to put the cover back on.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Tore in half before could even use it
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great product. I bought it for my wife as soon as I found out she was pregnant at 4 weeks. Since I didn't realize she wouldn't need it until her second trimester, since it had been unused from purchase, I took off the cover to wash it before her fist use. As soon as I started to remove the cover, the pillow ripped it half at the slightest touch. I am so disappointed as this was not a cheap option and is not completely unsalvageable. I hope the manufacturer will be please make this right and send me a new pillow and fix this product for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you do need this.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I skipped this with my first pregnancy. Using your husband as your pillow is good, but this is better!!!! I was actually able to fall asleep and stay asleep (aside from getting up to pee three times a night,) when I got this around 25 weeks. Not too firm, not too fluffy. Fits nicely in queen bed, even with my husband and the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Heytherewhiskey

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple of weeks to get use to this, and now I don’t know if I would survive without it! My only complaint is that I wish it came in a size that’s a little longer. I’m 5’9 and a few extra inches would make it amazing. It has been very helpful keeping me off my back, which is how I usually sleep. I definitely recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: V Laz

customer_reviews.title: A little warm
customer_reviews.text: I think I need to practice with this a bit more. It really does take some getting used to and not all positions are comfortable for me. I also didn't consider how hot it would be to have something wrapped around you like this! I think part of my problem right now is that I get so overheated during the night because of this pillow being wrapped around my body that I'm tossing and turning and not sleeping very well. I have started sleeping with just a sheet over me to help, but I wish this pillow was more breathable and allowed for better airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Need for sleeping while pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was such a lifesaver towards the end of my pregnancy. You aren’t supposed to sleep on your back and this helped me sleep on my side comfortably. I do wish the material was a little softer. Also the case comes off to wash, but is nearly impossible to get back on. Took both me and my husband to get it back on, and still wasn’t easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri L Williams

customer_reviews.title: I am a petite woman and I thought my neck was uncomfortable because the pillow was too high (I usually sleep on pretty flat pillows) so I removed some of the stuffing
customer_reviews.text: This pillow started out comfy but the longer I slept on it, the more uncomfortable it became. I am a petite woman and I thought my neck was uncomfortable because the pillow was too high (I usually sleep on pretty flat pillows) so I removed some of the stuffing. Unfortunately this did not help in the slightest. I ended up ditching this expensive pillow and opting for my fortress of four individual pillows instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie B.

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase ever since the beginning of my pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase for a comfortable sleep ever!!! I had the best uninterrupted sleep after I purchased this. I am in the beginning of the third trimester and I wish I had this before! Worth the price and the space it takes. I use this for comfortable seating too. It supports from all the back and front. Big enough to place under my belly while it gives supportto my neck and back and in between my legs. My son is in love with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Kiral

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at 4 months pregnant. I was really excited to use it. When I got it in the mail I quickly opened it and tried it out. It’s kind of hard and just a weird shape. I could not get comfortable with this pillow what so ever and it also just takes up a lot of space to where I felt I was taking all the space from my husband. Now it’s in the closet and I’m bummed I can’t return it because it’s brand new and was a waste of $60.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: As much as I miss just sleeping with my personal pillow, this has been a lifesaver for my hips. I’ve had burning hips since second trimester and with this pillow, it aligns my body perfectly and takes pressure off my back and hips, allowing me to sleep without pain. Only difficulty is switching sides, but that’s to be expected. :p But its definitely an essential I take everywhere with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it while I figure out how to lay on my side!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and moves enough so you can grow into it. It's a little stiff so your neck sits slightly higher but it's overall comfy. It stops me from rolling on my back since I'm a back sleeper and this is mainly what I wanted it for. I have to get up once a night to flip it over to switch sides because i start getting uncomfortable after I've been on one side all night. This might just be me though? Overall I am glad I purchased this and it's been more comfortable for me than sticking a pillow between my legs.
customer_reviews.author: TTBB33

customer_reviews.title: wish it stayed like the photo shown
customer_reviews.text: initially the pillow looked like what you see in the photo but it stretched out the 1st night & now its this 10ft long narrow pillow that I can wrap around myself & the wife. instead i wish it had a bit more "meat" to it so that it can be hugged better & provide better cushioning between legs & knees (mainly why i bought it). but I have been sleeping better to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Boogyman6788

customer_reviews.title: Great for second trimester
customer_reviews.text: I bought this around 10 weeks pregnant and used it up until around 30 weeks. I thought it was great for that time. After 30 weeks I found it difficult to get into. You really have to position yourself into it and late 3rd trimester that is a difficult task. I found using a wedge was much easier at the end. The case the pillow comes with is terrible. It is scratchy and gets ratty looking fast. I ended up making a case out of normal pillow cases which worked out great
customer_reviews.author: Yelnam

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me while I was pregnant with our daughter! It was a total waste of money! Extremely uncomfortable! So firm you could barely move it to fit how you wanted it too, literally hard as a rick, and it was a serious pain to take off and put back on the cover! DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow when I was only 8 weeks pregnant because my hips and back were hurting. It really helps relieve the pain at night. I’m 22 weeks now and I still sleep with it every night. My preferred way of sleeping with it is facing the long side and hugging it. It is annoying sometimes how huge it is, and it makes cuddling with my husband difficult. But overall I wouldn’t get as good of quality of sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Having a zipper or even velcro in the middle part would be a good solution for the cover
customer_reviews.text: After my first night with this, wished the width of the pillow was a little wider. I'm petite, and there's not much to hug. Also, I'm a neat freak who washes my bedding about every 2 weeks. It's going to be dreadful to put these on. I had a difficult time putting the cover back on. I did get it on at the end, but it took a while. Having a zipper or even velcro in the middle part would be a good solution for the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase! I have lower back/ hip problems that I see a chiropractor for. He recommended this pillow for me. My leg used to go numb while I slept. Since I got this pillow a few months ago I haven’t had that issue. It’s great! I also got a cover for it which is easy to take off and put on for washing. I would recommend it and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: User Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Would rather use pillows and blankets
customer_reviews.text: Love this idea, but I stuck to compiling soft blankets and pillows on my back and belly. Because o move a lot, it gave me more flexibility and I felt more control over changing the position of where the cushions were tucked. This pillow felt limiting and even had a bit of a scratchy texture on its case. I didn’t like it and never even made it through one night.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I had this pillow two years ago and loved it. This time the fabric cover seems to be a bit too small as it doesn't fit flush with the pillow and as a result when i lay on it the pulled cover presses against my neck which has caused more neck pain than back relief. I really needed this to work since I’m 7 months into my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Nesha

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is a life savior
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a life savior. It was painful to manage five pillows all around my body that I had to adjust each time I moved. This pillow allows you to sleep comfortably throughout the night without worrying about flipping on your back. Even if you do, it will keep your body tilted preventing you from lying flat on your back. Changing positions is easy since you can just pull the pillow and it will snuggle your body.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size - Buy the extra case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I'm 5'8" and it is great. Using the top as a pillow was too much for me (too high), so I straighten out that part and use my old pillow. My Hubby loves this pillow more than my old one because it actually takes up less of his space. (We are VERY "you're on my side" kind of people) This is puffy with out being too wide. The pillow needs a case. It's a pain (like REALLY) to put it on. My pregnancy hormones had me throw it at my man to do it for me. :) OOPS! SUPER COMFY!!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Cleeland

customer_reviews.title: Not the right fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow in my opinion wasn't worth the money I spent, it is very uncomfortable and I am short so I thought it would be a cozy fit but it's not at all. Also getting the pillow case back on is a real pain, it should have been a zipper!!! Dosen't mean it won't work for someone else just wasn't a good fit for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Esquilin Royal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy! The dog is fighting me for it
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfy it is. Yes, it does "flatten" and I've found that it doesn't support my head as well as I'd like, so I've taken the shorter end and placed my pillow in between and the "U" end tucks between my legs and under my tail. I sleep like a dream. Feel free to flip it over and around to even out the shape. I love how it's not as bulky as other pregnancy pillows and that the material is made in the USA, so you won't find that toxic chemical stuffing. My dog thinks it's a really big dog bed for her :)
customer_reviews.author: Chriss714

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pregnancy and I have a deep arch in my back which got deeper with the pregnancy. I brought this pillow in hopes it would help with the back pain but it had not. It’s really firm and I don’t like it. I use it more folded up on the sofa as back support rather than in the bed. When I sleep with it I get neck cramps. It could just be that I need something in between my legs more than Something head to toe. Right now I prefer my 3 standard pillows and 1 king size pillow than this one.
customer_reviews.author: PiaMia

customer_reviews.title: BEST PILLOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was doing a lot of research as to which maternity pillow I should get and I am so glad I purchased this one. Although on the pricer side very well worth it. I like that I am able to use it in so many different configurations, I even use it to sit on the coach and watch TV. It has definitely helped me with the added support to be able to sleep more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Stuffing not enclosed in pillowcase.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow helped me through my first and second pregnancy. It was used more throughout my first than the second, but when I went to use it again for my second pregnancy, I took the cover off to wash the cover and the stuffing was not in the casing like it should have been. So now I am at the end of my second pregnancy and I am using half of the pillow where the stuffing is left. I’m hoping this was just a fluke, but I am disappointed that this has happened.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Def a sleep saver!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I would want one bc it takes up so much space. However, my hub got it for me when I was about 5 months pregnant. Its very comfortable. Provides great support and prevents me from rolling over onto my back. I'm about 7 months now and experiencing rib pain so I allows to halfway lay on my back. Only wish the tag is on the back of the C curve instead of top or bottom and maybe it be darker in color. White is hard to keep clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: 90% perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my snoogle and I sleep with it every night. It checks all the boxes ... except one! The material used for the cover is very rough. Left a 1-star review for the extra pillow case I bought for it in sage green. Nice color... but that's the only plus side. If a friend were asking me about it'd, I'd say that I love the support it provides, it's so comfy, it's easy to spiral-up and store under the bed even though its quite large, but that I'd keep looking at other makers and get one where the reviews mention the materials.
customer_reviews.author: deltron

customer_reviews.title: I could not get comfortable in bed or on the couch anymore
customer_reviews.text: This pillow saved me through my pregnancy. I could not get comfortable in bed or on the couch anymore. But once I received this pillow, I was sleeping great again. It did not help me with staying off my back during the last few months of pregnancy and I did have some issues with it becoming somewhat flat after using it for a couple of months, but I would definitely recommend this product to any mom who is expecting and tired!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is awesome, no more back pain at night
customer_reviews.text: So happy I came across this pillow and gave it a try. I have serious back issues and this pillow has saved me. I can finally sleep through the night and wake with no pain. I was concerned it would be to big for the bed based on some of the reviews, but it's not that big at all. It's perfect. Still plenty of room for my husband to sprawl across the bed while I curl up with my Snoogle. Definitely a must-have for back pain sufferers.
customer_reviews.author: lisagat

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for your wife
customer_reviews.text: Best gift my husband has ever bought for me. Got it because I was pregnant but even now that my baby is 3yo I’m still using it every night. Makes my husband a bit jealous sometimes- he calls it my boyfriend pillow 😂 Also we co-slept with our baby & I would wrap this around me & her. It made it so I could sleep peacefully knowing that it’d stop her from rolling off the bed & it’d stop my hubby from rolling onto the baby. Seriously this pillow is worth it’s weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: I simply slide the pillow up a little bit and it works fine. I truly replaces most
customer_reviews.text: the curve at the top is fairly narrow/ tight as described by others but I also do not cram/jam my neck or shoulders in that area. I simply slide the pillow up a little bit and it works fine. I truly replaces most, if not all of the pillows that you sleep with. I am over six feet tall and over 200lbs and I sleep comfortable with this pillow. hip and back pain have noticeably decreased first thing in the morning. I am very happy after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this pillow! Not only did it help me find comfort during my pregnancy, and then help me sleep/nurse comfortably while sitting up once our baby arrived, but we’ve found so many other uses as well. Our dog is in love with it and will curl up in it at every opportunity. When our son was an infant we wrapped it up tight like a little nest and he slept snuggly for naps right on the couch next to us. I am now, almost 3 years after purchase, currently nestled in the cozy cocoon of my Snoogle finding relief from a backache. It’s just the best, and you won’t regret buying this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: cK

customer_reviews.title: It got flatten after only a month.
customer_reviews.text: Although I paid less for an open package, it said new and I did not like the fact that I found hair on it Plus, after only a month of usage, the pillow got completely flat. Almost useless now. I won’t recommend this pregnancy pillow to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: If pregnant, YOU NEED THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This being my first pregnancy I didn’t know the pain that came with it. My back was constantly in pain as my hips due to the tilt when laying on my side and belly pulling me downward. I needed something to support the belly weight, this pillow definitely did the job. Easy to wash as well. Definitely recommend to all the mommy’s out there.
customer_reviews.author: Estefanny Sigala

customer_reviews.title: You can be little spoon anytime you want!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, she loved it so much that I teased that I was going to steal it, and I did one night just messing around...and wow, I want one for myself. This pillow makes you little spoon, it's wonderful. Now I'm seriously debating purchasing one for myself. It's very well made, the filling is much more dense then a regular body pillow, which is needed since it's smaller diameter and won't collapse easily. I imagine it fits any size person since my wife is 5'1" and I am 6'1".
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, good support, but crotch sweat
customer_reviews.text: This helps me sleep through the night, very comfortable! Only thing is it does wrap around you so I find myself sweating especially in my crotch area every night. I'm 23 weeks pregnant and I honestly couldn't do without this! The sweating issue is annoying but it's worth it to get sleep. I sleep with a towel under me, a fan on me and have to religiously shower every morning and wash my sheets more because of the sweating issue though, but honestly, great support for my back, belly and head, and not sure how the sweating issue could be avoided, so I think it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Beebs

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for a bit won't last your entire pregnancy if used regularly.
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is great in the beginning but starts to flatten within weeks of use. the filling is that pollyfoam fluffy stuff that is in cheap pillows that separates and settles in lumps within the case. it can not be washed to help fluff up. the outer part can but the pillow itself cannot. for the price it would be nicer if it had a memory foam interior or something better to withstand the pressure points that it is supposed to protect instead of flattening and proving redundant.
customer_reviews.author: BookwormNJ

customer_reviews.title: PREGNANCY MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is by far one of my favorite pregnancy purchases. I bought it because I was trying to sleep on my left side and not roll over on my back too much, and this pillow really helped! It is sooo comfortable. It's definitely big but not a problem for us since we have a king size bed. Might be an issue for a couple in a smaller bed though. This is 100% a pregnancy must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for someone who tosses and turns
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because of my person experience (which won't apply to everyone) I read so many great things but ended up getting rid of mine after only using it a handful of times due to how I sleep. I toss and turn to much to have this stationary pillow. I found for me that a couple of airplane neck pillows are my jam. I can put one between my legs to support my hips and I can hug or stick the other one under my belly. They are easy to move with and provide enough support.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Petite Body Pillow, Great for Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and smaller size of this pillow. I am 5' tall and the pillow is still plenty large for me. I pull it in close to support my baby bump in the third trimester. It's not so bulky that my cat and husband cannot fit in the bed. I only wish it we're available with a premium down alternative fill instead of run of the mill polyfil.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Stupid pillow 😣
customer_reviews.text: Hate this stupid thing! 😞 Not only is it so uncomfortable and leaves my right shoulder incredibly sore by morning, but the inside seems are SO TIGHT that while moving in bed and adjusting, a corner completely ripped. Garbage pillow, lasted maybe 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kayte

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1-2 trimesters only
customer_reviews.text: I got this during my 2nd trimester and it works great but once I got into my 3rd trimester and I was bigger it started to get uncomfortable. It was like a jungle gym trying to get out of that thing several times a night to go use the bathroom. Also it forces you to stay in one position all night which made me wake up stiff. If I wanted to switch positions I had to lunge the whole thing over to a different side. It just became a hassle. My husband now uses it as his pillow because I steal the other regular pillows to shove them under my back, under belly, head and legs lol!
customer_reviews.author: Book M Lover

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed by Leachco products
customer_reviews.text: The cover that it comes with is very rough. I bought another one by Leach but that pilled after the first wash. Within 6 months of use, the pillow has ripped at the seam, the original cover is pilly, and the additional cover I bought is pillow and doesn't fit well. Overall, very disappointed by Leachco products. I reached out to customer service and they are refusing to help. Don't buy from a company that doesn't stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sam

customer_reviews.title: less body pains and sleeps comfortably. The only downfall is that my wife says ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't express enough how much this pillow has changed my wife's pregnancy! She has less body aches, less body pains and sleeps comfortably. The only downfall is that my wife says the material is rough on the skin, she places a sheet over the top half so it's not so rough. A softer material would have been icing on the cake! Other than that, it's an A+! I must note, our cat & dog also adore this pillow as much as my wife, they take turns keeping it warm for my wife before bed. Haha! Seriously, this pillow is a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: MoncrieffFamily

customer_reviews.title: So worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I need 2 of these! Super great gift idea. Daughter loved this especially while pregnant. Helped back and hip pain go away. Buy 10 of them for yourself now, and 2 for every person you know! Washed up great in large capacity washing machine and dried well too. Still hilding up 2 years+ later
customer_reviews.author: sh1975

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help with my back pain
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this pillow while pregnant to help with comfort and back pain. When I first lay down in this pillow it seems very comfortable. However, I continue to wake up throughout the night and in the morning with really bad back pain still. The only way i've been able to stop the back pain is if i lay on my back with the pillow under one side so i'm not completely on my back. For some reason, it also gives me an earache in the morning...not sure what the cause of that is. Overall, I'm still using it as it does provide some additional comfort but it is not helping with my back pain as i was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good product except for the pillow case
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is good, provides support and it has helped me to sleep a bit better now that I'm pregnant. Something I didn't pay attention to was that the pillow case does not come with a zipper which makes it really complicated! You have to make sure that the case is going in the right direction and it takes no less than 10 minutes to complete the task.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: does not help with backpain all that much, but it's still comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping with this pillow for about a week now, and I had high hopes that I would help my pregnancy induced back pain, while I think it makes it a bit better, I'm still in pain quite a bit. It does support my back while i'm sleeping on my side when I snug it in, and it's easier and more comfortable than a million pillows tucked in just right, but overall not quite the miracle cure I was hoping for. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: J. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: try regular pillows before you explore this
customer_reviews.text: i'm only 5'4 but the product feels really small. If I were to sleep like the lady pictured in the ad, I can't fully relax and my head and neck hurts the next day. I ended up using it like a regular long pillow for hugging. that said, my 5'1 sister had one and found the product a must-have during her pregnancy. so i'm not sure if it's my height or just personal preference. I'd really start with extra pillows to support the belly since they won't take up as much space in your bed.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: At first this pillow was great for pregnancy. It helped me get comfortable at night and it is very full and supportive. However, after only two months of using it tucked between my legs the pillow has completely separated in two and is no longer supportive at all in that area. Now I need to try to find a replacement with a few weeks left in pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow. I'm only 12 weeks but having a tough time getting comfortable at night, especially dealing with extreme first trimester "morning sickness." This is a good length and super comfortable. Material feels great. I recommend it (I bought the ivory).
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good for third trimester
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely helped me sleep in third trimester. I find it most comfortable with my belly toward the opening. It’s sort of frustrating in the middle of the night when you are ready to turn over. You can also use it to lie on your back and elevate your shoulders high enough to be safe and comfortable. I make it more versatile by added a wedge or normal pillow depending on how I can get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great its super comfortable and fits to my body perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great its super comfortable and fits to my body perfectly and helps me sleep on my back during my pregnancy which has been a challenge since i'm a belly sleeper, the only thing I do not like it the cover on the pillow its easy to remove and wash but its a nightmare trying to put it back on, it would be easier if it had a zipper so you can easily put it back on, I just took it off completely after struggling to get it back on after washing it, I just wash the whole pillow its easier.
customer_reviews.author: peta

customer_reviews.title: Too thick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have back problems and my doctor and physical therapist recommend that I sleep with a pillow between my knees and ankles. I wanted a body pillow that would not go flat but this one is too thick for my neck. It works perfect between my knees and ankles but I cannot sleep on it all night because it hurts my neck after awhile. Because of the way it's shaped you cannot push it back from your head. You have to rest your head on it. I don't use a pillow either when I sleep with it because it is so thick.
customer_reviews.author: Tweetie

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pillow I've bought. The first one lasted about 2 years, which is great for a pillow. I'm not pregnant but I've had back surgeries and I have fibromyalgia and rheumatoid arthritis and this pillow helps me wake up with considerably less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: I would give it six stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a GAME CHANGER for me for sleeping while pregnant. Purchased it when I was around 5 months because I was waking up with all sorts of stiffness and joint pain, and this pillow made me more comfortable at night immediately. Warning though... It's fairly huge. If your bed is smaller than queen size, you partner is definitely going to feel cramped!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Fall asleep quickly
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable. Fall asleep quickly. Cons: Big and bulky, Hard to change positions, Head-part of the pillow is thicker and firmer than my normal pillow so this can get uncomfortable in the middle of the night. I also wish the end of the pillow would come up a bit more or if it were fuller like a normal pillow to support my pregnant belly better. Overall, this is a good pillow. Not a miracle-worker but it is nice to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy Family

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I had a hand-me-down previously and it was time for an upgrade! It was a little stiff right out of the box but after a couple of nights breaking it in, it’s soo comfortable and provides much needed support at this halfway point in my pregnancy! I’m also a natural back sleeper so this has helped to keep me on my side!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable..produces neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and gave it an 'honest' try, but honestly it is so stiff that it hurts my neck if I am using it too long. I have tried several positions and just can't seem to get comfortable. I will keep it in case when my belly grows larger that it will be better..though that is optimistic. I keep throwing it off in the middle of the night. I will say for propping myself up while reading, watching TV, or relaxing in bed- it's great or the brief support for my hips when laying down after a long day. Just not great to actually SLEEP with. I am 5'7'', 175 pounds and 22 weeks pregnant for your reference.
customer_reviews.author: primeuser100610

customer_reviews.title: Love it for joint pain!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 64 yrs. old and definitely not pregnant. I do suffer from severe arthritis in ALL my joints. This pillow is great and has replaced my normal 5 or 6 pillows. It also relieves a lot of pain by providing support and alignment as well as cushioning for my neck, hips, knees etc. The back support keeps me from rolling over. I love this pillow! If you suffer from joint/back problems I would recommend you try this. I don't use any other pillow while sleeping except this one any more.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The pillow came very quickly and in good quality. It has been amazing in helping me to sleep and stay on my side. It is extremely comfortable. I am only giving it 4 stars, however; because I find it is already going flat and I have only used it for around 2 months thus far. I don't see a zipper on the side that allows for more stuffing to be added, so I guess I will have to cut along the seam to add more stuffing and sew it back up when it becomes to flat to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not regret my purchase in the slightest. I am not pregnant, but I have chron's disease and this helps me position in ways that reduce stomach pain and provide me with support. I'm able to roll over and change positions with minimal discomfort now. I do tend to keep it long sides towards the wall though, simply because I don't want a barrier between my husband and myself. I would recommend this to anyone who uses a ton of pillows to position yourself, this one pillow has replaced six needless pillows on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: morgan white

customer_reviews.title: Saved our marriage!
customer_reviews.text: Well, not really. but we can now have full night's sleep (well, except for the bathroom breaks), as we know they'll be hard to come by in a few weeks. it really allows for more comfort while sleeping. If there's 1 complaint to be made, it's that it didn't come with a pillow case. So, if it gets dirty (from hair product, or make-up, or just sweat), it's going to be stained for good. Also, I'm not really sure what to do with this once the baby's here and the pillow isn't needed anymore. it's not exactly something that's easy to wrap up and store.
customer_reviews.author: King DingDong

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love my smoothie. Used it for my first pregnancy and will use it for others to come. Very comfortable and you can arrange it around your body as you need. I had bad back pain during my pregnancy so I used it mainly for more support on my back. Assisted with giving me great night sleeps
customer_reviews.author: Steffane Smith

customer_reviews.title: I am a back sleeper and this pillow made it easy to sleep on my side and prevented me from ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I would have survived this pregnancy without this pillow. I am a back sleeper and this pillow made it easy to sleep on my side and prevented me from ending up on my back. It also made me as comfortable as possible in the end. I actually had more good nights than bad nights. Which I know is not common in the third trimester. The c-shape kept my back aligned to prevent backache. The shape also allowed an easy exit from the pillow for all those late night bathroom breaks. I am now 3 months postpartum and I am still using this pillow. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Mai S.

customer_reviews.title: Provides Much Needed Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Every pregnant woman I know swears by this pillow! I can tell you that I absolutely love mine! I didn't really feel the benefits as much until my bump got bigger and bak started to hurt more. Since then, this pillow has been invaluable! I sleep with it every night and they have different ways to fold this pillow so you can sit comfortably with it propping you up! Be aware that this pillow is going to take up a bunch of extra space in bed. It's worth the sacrifice for the comfort you will gain! Also, this pillow holds in heat so if you are hot-natured, get ready to sleep with just a sheet or crank down the air.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow for third trimester
customer_reviews.text: Second time mom in my third trimester and thanks to the Leachco Snoogle, I'm finally being able to sleep through the night! Never thought I'd buy one of these pillows, but they do make a difference in terms of support, are great for resting my legs and avoiding swelling and my toddler also loves it! Good quality, fair price, and seems a good investment in your sleep and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: The Mends

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: My wife, pregnant with twins, could not get comfortable with this. It somehow caused her more pain and we studied the item too on the best way to utilize this to no avail. So I suggest being cautious with this purchase. What did work better, was the U-pillows that isn't forced into a C shape, which allowed you to adjust it more freely.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Town

customer_reviews.title: Not pregnant and Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am not pregnant, but asked my mom to get this for me for my birthday. I am a side sleeper and notice my back will hurt a lot. This is great because it gives my back support and also my hips when I lay with it between my legs. I sleep so good. I used to wake up multiple times a night and now I don't wake up until my alarm goes off in the morning. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: HKK

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to buy one of these pillows. I bought it during my second pregnancy when my hips were in so much pain I couldn't sleep, even sitting became a chore it was so painful. I bought this pillow and used it for sleeping as well as wrapping it up underneath me while sitting on my couch, it made a world of difference. It's so comfy I caught my husband and toddler laying on it on several different occasions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pillow, helps so much with sleep quality and back pain when pregnant. My only complaint is the cover. It doesn't have a zipper, so stuffing it back in the cover after every wash, especially while very pregnant is very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow early in my pregnancy and it really helped me throughout the whole process! I never experienced terrible sleeping problems as a result of adopting this early. Don't wait till you can't sleep! Buy it before the problems start! Now that the baby is born, I can still use it for nursing (although it is quit large-- only really functional if sitting in bed-- not in a chair). Still great. I will hold onto this for the next baby for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Simoaney

customer_reviews.title: Super scratchy cover
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail, and so I haven't had the chance to sleep with it yet. But the cover to this thing is super scratchy and nearly impossible to take off (was thinking that washing it could soften it up!) I started to try to, and heard a ripping sound so I stopped.. I looked and it's almost entirely polyester, and has a faint chemically smell. I thought it was going to be soft and cozy, but I have to say I'm less than enthused about trying it out tonight :( Bummed out!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pregnancy or anyone looking for a good body hugging pillow. Its awesome.
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I didn't know what pregnancy was going to be like or what to expect. I also didn't know the value of a good body pillow. I bought the Leachco Snoogle and absolutely loved it. It made sleeping so much easier and I could actually get some relief on those body parts that just have aches and pains that come with pregnancy. I had also tried the body pillow from Babies R us brand. It was hard and stiff. The LEACHCO SNOOGLE was soft and fluffy and literally hugged my body. I will buy again and recommend it to anyone who is pregnant or just needs a good body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing product! It's so great
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my wish list for a few weeks now and I finally broke down and bought the pillow. What an amazing product! It's so great, I'm writing my first review EVER! I should have bought the pillow sooner. It is worth the money because you actually sleep great and wake up feeling rested with no aches or hip pain. I am 5'4", 160lbs, 6 months pregnant and this pillow fits me great. I love all the different positions the pillow will fold into and so far, the pillow hasn't gone flat. Also, if you are a stomach sleeper like me, you will be extremely comfortable with this pillow. I'm so glad I spent the money!
customer_reviews.author: HarasEel

product_meta.title: Leachco Snoogle Original Maternity/Pregnancy Total Body Pillow, Ivory
product_meta.description: Color:Ivory| Design:PillowLeachco recognizes Ella sparkle, meislin CNY sales, and dainty baby as authentic sellers or distributors of the Leachco brand Snoogle original total body pillow. Leachco does not confirm a relationship with any other sellers or the authenticity of their products as being authentic Leachco brand products. If you are like most people, one pillow throughout the night is just not enough. There's the pillow that goes behind your back for support, The one between your knees for temperature control and the two to Prop up your head to aid in breathing. And, if you're pregnant don't forget to add one more for tummy support. The Snoogle is uniquely designed to follow the natural contour and shape of your body from head to toe. Perfect for sleeping and relaxing. Complete with removable/washable cover. The horseshoe shaped head pillow allows you to attain the position and height that is just right for you. The extra long midsection is the perfect width for total back or tummy; depending on the direction you choose to snuggle up in your Snoogle. The slightly curved end tucks snugly between the knees as it conforms to your shape keeping you cool and comfortable all night long! Can help provide support for neutral positioning. For adult use only
feature_bullets: The first and true original Snoogle
Snoogle takes the place of multiple pillows to help support hips, back, neck, and tummy
Patented design was developed by a registered Nurse and mom
Enjoy cuddle comfort and support without the extra body heat.
Snoogle original has a sham-style removable cover that is machine washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars8,249 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
